description: Warnakulasooriya Arachchilage Anil Priyankara Vs Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J.
parties: Warnakulasooriya Arachchilage Anil Priyankara Vs Hon. Attorney General
keywords: - Imposing death sentence on an accused below the age of 18 years. - Applicability of Section 53 of the Penal Code. - The court has no discretion other than imposing the death penalty for the offence of murder.
legistation: -Section 53, 296, 300 of the Penal Code. -Section 281 of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act.
